extendedInfo.description: Do you know your car brands and models? Prove it in "Name That Car", a hot new car trivia game that you can download for free.â 400 cars to discoverâ 14 achievementsâ 6-10 hours of gameplayâ everything is FREEEE :) The images in our free game are randomised so when you restart the game you will get the cars in a different succesion every time - this way no one can cheat by memorising the car orders - a necessary precaution for any car trivia game on the market.The difficulty in "Name That Car" increases as you play along. First you start with 3x3 tiles and 2 car options and as the game continues you will get to 6x6 tiles and 4 options per car.There are supercars, classic cars, muscle cars, SUVs, sedans, roadsters... everything is in here. Check out some of the cars we decided to feature in our game - and your feedback is always welcome!â Lamborghini Aventadorâ Ferrari Enzoâ Bugatti Veyronâ Rolls Royce Phantomâ Aston Martin reviews.title: Great!!
reviews.comment: This game NEVER freezes runs smooth and fast no lags or anything awesome love this game
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: love iiit
reviews.comment: i looooove this game because i enjoy watching the pics. very b u tiiiiiiifullll cars love it love it love it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ferrari 599 Gto....
reviews.comment: The 599 is not really a plate of gray steel, some pics are low res, some cars are rather modded and not as the original model, some pix are half street half car, some are not really the best questions \"what Merc is?\" (out of all high end new Merc options given, and they look almost the same...), lots of room for improvement but entertaining, 3 stars for now, waiting for update
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Challenging!
reviews.comment: Great game! Good mix of current and classic cars from many eras, American and foriegn. It really tests your eye for detail. its most fun to try and guess the car from just one square! Addictive to the true car nut!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: cool cars
reviews.comment: its awesome theres cool cars its really great for a naming game
reviews.author: Angelito Alcuitas

reviews.title: Awesome game!
reviews.comment: Very enjoyable for a nice short game, great for enthusiasts no doubt its fun guessing with a single tile
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best graphics
reviews.comment: Awesome car selection. Cool tracks and fun races.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: It\'s a great fun entertaining game for anyone who loves cars
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great, sorta
reviews.comment: I love cars espicially when it comes to naming them. Though this game has annoying music and sfx. Though overall, enjoyable. :-)
reviews.author: Andrew o Brien

reviews.title: Super fun!!
reviews.comment: Really fun game!  If you love cars, you will love this game!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Love the game. Superb for car enthusiasts. Well built
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome...
reviews.comment: Excellent game. Really shuts up the empty vessels who think.they know cars.
reviews.author: prabhu naidoo

reviews.title: Cj
reviews.comment: This is an EXCELLENT game, you can go up to unreal levels!!!!!!!!! Its my life to make it!!!
reviews.author: Callum Gardner

reviews.title: Addictive
reviews.comment: Very fun with a good range of vehicles from early 1900s to still show room floor shiny lol. Definitely worth your time to download.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Its a cool app for car plp. Alot of cars you know and that you probably dont. They should add somekind of leaderboards. Overall its a great app for when you are bored.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing Game
reviews.comment: A really amazing really cool really great game nice to see some more up dates more new cars as they come out but apart from that this is a 5 * Game
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun Time-waster
reviews.comment: Fun game to test your skills. Has some issues though. One level didnt have anything behind the tiles. Some levels has cars that aren\'t from the same era which makes it even easier to guess the car. But a great app to test your car skills :)
reviews.author: Joonatan Moilanen

reviews.title: Has potential
reviews.comment: Very repetitive. Many of the cars repeat and after level 50 achievements are non existent and no way to see the few achievements received. Many of the cars are mislabeled. A 1957-59 vette was labeled as a 53 for example.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: App for motor heads
reviews.comment: Really fantastic app, nice tricky question to solve, but if you aren\'t a motor head this won\'t interst you
reviews.author: Sarah Kazi

reviews.title: Ace!
reviews.comment: Apart from one low level with no picture! Fantastic for car people,been playing for 15min, i\'m on level 50 with over 12000 points. Lovin it!
reviews.author: A Google User
